tasks.task: Operate agricultural equipment with new technologies
subtasks: Recognize growth of precision farming team
Explain integration of precision farming into tractor systems
Describe custom solutions for specialty crop farmers
Address cost considerations for premium crops like seed corn
Implement row shutoff controls for efficient planting

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Operate agricultural equipment with new technologies
subtasks: Understand precision farming department functions – Eric highlights the precision farming department's role in Johnson Tractor, which has grown from part-time to two full-time staff and an intern.
Recognize growth of precision farming team – The department has expanded over three years, indicating increasing demand for precision farming expertise.

Explain integration of precision farming into tractor systems – Precision farming is becoming a standard feature, akin to other tractor components, requiring technicians to know how monitors and other equipment interact.
Describe custom solutions for specialty crop farmers – The team provides tailored solutions, such as shutoff controls, to prevent waste in expensive crops like seed corn.
Address cost considerations for premium crops like seed corn – Farmers use shutoff controls to avoid overlapping and wasting expensive inputs (e.g., seed corn) to protect their investments.
Implement row shutoff controls for efficient planting – New technologies simplify row shutoff procedures, allowing operators to set up hoppers and plant without frequent manual adjustments.
